title: Registration and Breakfast
description: Find our volunteers at the registration table, get a badge and a schedule, and join us for a scrumptious breakfast! Those who wish to participate in the "#IamRemarkable" Workshop must sign up at registration as space is limited.

title: Welcome Address
speaker: GDG Cloud Miami & GDG Miami & GWC SoFlo
description: Welcome to DevFest Miami 2019! During this time, we will do introductions and go over the logistics for the day.

title: Building Apps Like You Mean It - How to make sure that everyone can use your product, regardless of ability.
speaker: Claudio Luis Vera
description: Confessions and advice from a web designer / developer / empath on his journey to becoming an accessibility expert.

title: Mingle Lunch
description: Enjoy a healthy lunch sponsored Sylvester Comprehensive Cancer Center while mingling with other attendees and speakers.

title: Track Talks
description: Attend a talk in one of three tracks! There will be a coffee & networking break after speaker 2 - between 2:05-2:25 pm.

talks.title: How to become a Google Certified Data Engineer
talks.speaker: Daniel Cadenas
talks.description: My experience in getting the Professional Data Engineer certification and how it has enhanced my life professionally.

talks.title: Building a CI/CD Pipeline With Cloud Run and Cloud Build
talks.speaker: Luis Casadesus
talks.description: Overview of Cloud Build. CI/CD tool. Lifecycle of a Cloud Build build. View your build results using the Gcloud tool. Overview of Cloud Run. Serverless computing a dvantages. Write a sample application, define the container, publish and deploy the app. Cloud Run on GKE.

talks.title: An Overview of Machine Learning and its Applications
talks.speaker: Kimoy Kotun

talks.title: Is it a Fire Pokemon or a Water Pokemon? Logistic Regression in Python
talks.speaker: Viviana Marquez, MSc.

talks.title: Site, Content, Action! - An Introduction to Google Assistant API for User Engagement
talks.speaker: Kavin Kannan
talks.description: Live Demo using the Assistant API

talks.title: Treating Infrastructure as Code - Implementing Terraform in CI/CD
talks.speaker: Roly Vicaria

talks.title: Flutter- Layout Strategies for the Android Programmer
talks.speaker: Danielle Cox

title: Coffee and Refreshment Break!
description: Enjoy and coffee, healthy snacks, and networking courtesy of Wix.com

title: Raffle!
description: The Girls Who Code Organization of South Florida will be selling raffle tickets to benefit their scholarship funds. Purchase 1 (or many!) to increase your chances of winning one of several Google prizes!

title: Workshops
description: Attend one of the three hands-on 90 - minute workshops below!

talks.title: GCP
talks.speaker: Mash Zahid & Layla Bouzoubaa
talks.description: Leveraging GCP with BigQuery and TensorFlow 2.0 model dev pipelines for an Utilities CRM engagement for building an end-to-end model that also compares against an H2O ensemble model run, walk-through of Colab notebook.

talks.title: IoT pt. 1 - Augmenting the Google Assistant with the MATRIX Creator
talks.speaker: Carlos Chacin
talks.description: Learn to set up Google Assistant on your MATRIX device. Interface with sensors and NFC!

talks.title: IoT pt. 2 - Lighten Up with Arduino
talks.speaker: Brandon Roberts
talks.description: Learn the basics for getting started with Arduino and create a light up project!

talks.title: #IamRemarkable
talks.speaker: Yasmary Hernandez & Ruth Llanos-Vos
talks.description: "#IamRemarkable is a Google initiative empowering women and underrepresented groups to celebrate their achievements in the workplace and beyond. The workshop will highlight to participants the importance of self promotion in their careers and provide them with the tools to practice this skill."

title: Happy Hour Begins!
description: For those not interested in attending a workshop, stay and socialize/network with your new DevFest friends over some drinks and light hors d'oeuvres :)

title: Closing Remarks
description: Closing remarks by GDG Cloud Miami, GDG Miami, and Wix.com. Happy Hour until 6pm!
